pr_title: Add HiveMetadataUpdater to handle metadata updates

timeline.message:
Add ConnectorMetadataUpdateHandle resolver

ConnectorMetadataUpdateHandle will be used in communication
between workers and coordinator. So we need handle resolver
to assist in serialization/deserialization.

timeline.bodyText: Not a big fan of having setter and getter here. If we have to have something mutable, I would say make metadataContext in taskContext immutable and connectorId in metadataContext mutable. That will make this cleaner.

replies.bodyText: Done. Made the ConnectorId in TaskMetadataContext mutable
replies.author: NikhilCollooru

timeline.message:
Add ConnectorMetadataUpdater to handle worker's metadata updates

ConnectorMetadataUpdater is tunneled to PageSink, so that it
can create and send metadata update requests to coordinator.

Add ConnectorMetadataUpdateHandle resolver

ConnectorMetadataUpdateHandle will be used in communication
between workers and coordinator. So we need handle resolver
to assist in serialization/deserialization.
